name: Grim Harvester
description:
This game is an entry for Ludum Dare 52. TLDR

Play as a Grim Reaper and harvest human souls to upgrade your dice and protect the soul container. Build barricades in a smart way to stop enemies from moving forward. Show them who is the harvester.

STORY

Humans got mad and raid underworld where Grim Reaper resides. It’s a place where a SOUL CONTAINER is stored. A container that stores all humankind’s souls. Destroying it will free all souls. You MUST prevent this from happening.

CREDITS
